name: Space Haste 2
description:
SPACE HASTE II is an adrenaline pumping, futuristic racing game that puts players in the driver’s seat of the hottest hovercrafts on the planet. The game continually analyzes the player’s skills and times, building up their hovercraft’s speed throughout the race according to their abilities. But there is no limit to how much speed they can accumulate and the fastest rides through the breathtaking missions and backdrops will undoubtedly be the best ones!

  • 4 hovercrafts to choose from
  • Each hovercraft has 8 levels of enhancement
  • The better you are at driving, the quicker your hovercraft will enhance
  • Depending on your driving skills, the game keeps adding to the maximum speed of the hovercraft throughout the race
  • Hovercrafts actually have no speed limits
  • 11 pickups: Energy, Cloak, Bounce, Pilot, Blast, Boost, Flash, Stun, Drain, Shield and Haste
  • 3 race modes: Normal Race, Time Race and Shadow Racer
